content: crochet something bright colorful and cozy for your home if you love the moss stitch and you aren t afraid of colour then this is the perfect project for you the four triangles blanket is made up of 4 moss stitch triangles that are joined together before a border is added this blanket looks complicated but once you get the hang of the moss stitch a single_crochet and chain 1 stitch combination then it becomes a really fun mindless crochet project > the free pattern for the lapghan size 46 5 x 46 5 can be found ** here 1 ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms video tutorials yes step-by-step video tutorials are included in the pdf sizes the pdf includes instructions for 7 blanket sizes baby 35 x 35 lapghan 46 5 x 46 5 small throw 58 x 58 medium throw 69 x 69 large throw 81 x 81 queen 92 x 92 and king 104 x 104 > other details * 5 5mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited * the pdf also includes step-by-step pictures and video tutorials * the printable pdf is a total of 14 pages i hope you enjoy making and using your blanket 1 https //thispixiecreates com/four-triangles-moss-stitch-blanket/
